text: Succinctly articulating what we're all thinking.
The reciprocally muted conversation that silently guides the world.
... Detour through Gnostic Calvinism is the only way to have this discussion without everyone just shouting and pounding the table.
If this doesn't result in prompt execution, justice is an ugly joke in America.

I understand that people don't want it to be this simple, but most of what has gone wrong in the Anglosphere is obviously downstream from a century of not hanging enough criminals by at least five orders of magnitude.
Governments can't be trusted to keep people locked-up permanently.
I don't disagree. Asking what pathological leniency for criminality is downstream from is the right follow up question.
If so, removing its foot soldiers can still only help, while also sucking up its attention. (Trump admin. seems to understand this well.)
This is both the source of qualms about frequent executions and also their greatest contribution (to population quality).
Okay, but where does that argument stop. It could just as easily be said that the problem with hanging murderers is it incentivizes them to murder more to cover up the earlier murders.
Abundance is just Capital showing its WASP pathological-altruist roots by not directing enough of the industrial surplus into robotics to keep everyone lean-and-mean at the Malthusian limit.
It's encouraging how many people understand this.
Pointlessly undoing the rope's work and then some, for sure.
I'm begging you William to tell me that thing on the left isn't a judge.
... Don't want to be mean, but in the Lovecraft story they'd just shoot it and bury it in the forest for sound attempted cosmic horror avoidance reasons.
